page.title: 10DORNIE SHORELINE
page.content: The seashore is just outside our classroom window. One day we went to the shore to see what we could find. Under the stones we found crabs which looked like green moving stones.These were shore crabs.We found sandhoppers which are yellow,have lots of legs and jump out of your hand.The sea slaters we found are round,flat and hard.They are very fast and tickle you when you hold them.There were a lot of dog whelks and stones with barnacles on them.The whelks eat the barnacles. Under the brown seaweed was a centipede and a white sea worm.Suzanne found a spiny sea urchin and Paul a starfish.Sometimes we look out of our window and see a heron.We have also seen an otter,a seal,a swan and ducks.
